title: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society ruled by Big Brother.

title: The journey of a young boy discovering his magical heritage.

title: A fantasy adventure of a hobbit named Bilbo Baggins.

title: A story of wealth, love, and the American Dream in the 1920s.

title: A tale of racial injustice and moral growth in the Deep South.

title: A romantic story of manners and marriage in early 19th century England.

title: The quest of Captain Ahab to hunt the elusive white whale.

title: A chilling tale of isolation and supernatural horror in a haunted hotel.
